Name: Rising Tide
Title: Rising Tide - Normal
Desc: All the obstacles might not be special after the sound of the tide fades away.  In the stage, <color=#e1972f>Consciousness will stay stable for 300s</color>. (After 300s, <color=#e1972f>your enemy will be enhanced</color>.)

Name: Surging Waves
Title: Surging Waves - Hard
Desc: The surging waves will eventually turn into your experience, and this is doomed to be a challenging journey.  In the stage, <color=#e1972f>Consciousness will stay stable for 120s</color>. (After 120s, <color=#e1972f>your enemy will be enhanced</color>.) The enemy's <color=#e1972f>stats are slightly enhanced</color>.

Name: Abyssal Torrent
Title: Abyssal Torrent - Nightmare
Desc: Your most challenging adventure will start here amid the whispers of the abyss.  In the stage, <color=#E04E4E>Consciousness will stay stable for 90s</color>. (After 90s, <color=#E04E4E>your enemy will be enhanced</color>.) The enemy's <color=#E04E4E>stats are greatly enhanced</color>, and the stage <color=#E04E4E>difficulty is also significantly increased</color>.   You are suggested to start the challenge with <color=#E04E4E>characters with more than 7,500 BP</color>.
